name: FOREO Bear Microcurrent Facial Device - Face Sculpting Tool - Instant Face Lift - Firm & Contour - Non-Invasive - Increases Absorption of Facial Skin Care Products - Fuchsia
short_description: NON-INVASIVE FACE LIFT - Firm and contour with FOREO BEAR, at-home microcurrent facial device that tones the 65 plus muscles in your face & neck to provide an anti aging effect
3-MINUTE TREATMENT - The FDA-cleared face sculpting tool provides a quick & simple instant face lift with lasting results to help improve facial sagging, reduce puffiness & double chin
T-SONIC PULSATIONS - Relax facial muscle tension points & smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. They also improve blood flow, and increase absorption of facial skin care products
ANTI-SHOCK SYSTEM - Scans and measures skin’s resistance to electricity, and automatically adjusts microcurrent intensity for maximum safety & comfort.

2-YEAR WARRANTY - FOREO warrants this device for a period of TWO (2) YEARS after the original date of purchase against defects due to faulty workmanship or materials arising from normal use of the device. Register the device before first use to unlock.
STAGGERING BATTERY LIFE STAGGERING BATTERY LIFE : Up to 90 uses per single USB charge. One less thing to think about recharging.
product_description: Product Description BEAR smart facial toning device combines 5 levels of superior microcurrent with T-Sonic pulsations, to tighten and firm your skin. It features Anti-Shock System that scans your skin’s resistance to electricity & adjusts the microcurrent for maximum safety. To be used with SERUM SERUM SERUM. Brand Story FOREO is a Swedish multi-national beauty brand established and headquartered Stockholm, Sweden.

short_description: Breakthrough Fusion Applicators – Winner of Cosmopolitan 2023 "Holy Grail" Awards. The ultimate NuDerma system. Our clinical-grade system features a more powerful NuDerma wand and revolutionary FUSION Neon+Argon applicators. The 6 FUSION applicators provide the skin boosting anti-aging benefits of Neon and skin-balancing power of Argon in one universal delivery system. They work synergistically to create beautiful radiant skin while shortening treatment duration

Instant Skin Radiance – NuDerma treatments are a safe and 100% natural way of boosting your entire skin profile no matter your skin type. Nuderma Clinical turns back the clock by energizing and oxygenating skin at the cellular level. It also balances the skin ensure a smoother-looking complexion up to 90% faster. You’ll see a difference after just a single session.

Better Absorption of Your Beauty Serums and Creams – Your preferred beauty creams and serums are expensive. NuDerma ensures that you are getting their maximum effects by improving your skins receptiveness to absorption. Use your preferred serums or creams immediately after NuDerma Sessions to ensure maximum absorption into the deeper layers of your skin; boosting their effects by up to 5x.

Specialized Applicators for Total Body Sessions- NuDerma Clinical features specialized glass applicators like a Y-shaped wand that can conveniently be applied to areas like your arms and neck or a Rod applicator that works with broader areas like belly and back. A supercharged comb wand is perfect to energize the scalp and hair.

What's Included – 1 NuDerma Clinical Device, FUSION powered mushroom wand, FUSION powered Y-shape wand, FUSION powered comb wand with Tungsten, FUSION powered tongue wand, FUSION powered bent wand, FUSION powered rod wand with Tungsten, quick-start treatment guides, instruction and support contact manuals. A brand proudly based in the United States.

name: NuFACE Trinity+ Microcurrent Facial Device + Effective Lip & Eye Attachment - FDA Cleared Skin Tightening & Face Toning Device for Targeted Treatment + Microcurrent Gel Activator, Silk Crème & Brush
short_description: Clinically-Proven At-Home Treatment - The TRINITY+ microcurrent skin tightening device with Effective Lip & Eye Attachment uses the clinically proven benefits of microcurrent technology to provide a low-level electrical current, sending soft, gentle waves through the skin and down to the facial muscles. This customizable treatment tones, lifts & tightens for instant & long-term results anytime, anywhere.

Must-Have Microcurrent Skincare - Activate & lift with our microcurrent activators that conduct the microcurrent from your NuFACE device down to your facial muscles. Proprietary IonPlex® Technology delivers a precise concentration of ions and glacial water that help to prepare skin for your microcurrent treatment. The hydrating Aqua Gel locks in moisture for up to 24 hours and the firming & brightening Silk Crème hydrates skin with added anti-aging benefits.

Instant & Lasting On-The-Go Results - The sleek and portable design of your NuFACE TRINITY+ facial toning device makes it perfect for on-the-go lifting. Quick 5-minute sessions throughout the week help to sculpt and firm the face & neck, improve cheek contour, lift brows and smooth fine lines and wrinkles. 95% of users say they saw improvement in the appearance of sagging skin around the neck, 90% saw a more lifted jaw appearance, and 93% saw a reduction in the appearance of deep forehead lines.

Tighten and Tone Around the Eyes + Lips - In quick sessions, the Effective Lip and Eye Attachment enhances the results of your face tightening device thanks to ergonomical dual-wands that lift, tighten and tone hard-to-reach areas around the eyes and mouth.

FDA-Cleared Microcurrent Device - All NuFACE microcurrent face toning devices have been rigorously tested to meet the highest standards of safety and efficacy while all of our skin care products are aesthetician-created, and made with clean, fragrance-free ingredients.

short_description: THERMO-THERAPY DEEP FACIAL CLEANSING Expertly crafted combination of 8 thermal and ultra-hygienic silicone touchpoints enhanced by 8,000 T-Sonic pulsations per minute melt away and expel 99.5%* of dirt, oil, and makeup residue for clean, glowing, healthy-looking skin.

LIFT, TIGHTEN AND FIRM LIKE A PRO The most advanced non-invasive facial renewal solution for fit, contoured, younger-looking skin. Targeted microcurrent gently and precisely stimulates problem areas through a low-level electrical current for a firm, youthful appearance and enviable facial fitness.

CUTTING-EDGE BEAUTY TECH SELF-CARE One of a kind, combining the advanced top-of-the-line professional technologies and best body-safe and ultra-hygienic materials, LUNA 3 plus is the only beauty-tech in the whole world that features thermo-cleansing and precise microcurrent in one smart device

FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE SKIN SPA AT HOME Automatically syncs with FOREO For You app for absolute, detailed skincare personalization. Choose from a range of app-guided, meticulously constructed microcurrent routines while tailoring your preferred cleansing intensity, temperature, and microcurrent level.

QUALITY GUARANTEED BY A 2-YEAR WARRANTY FOREO warrants this device for a period of TWO (2) YEARS after the original purchase date. The warranty covers defects resulting from faulty workmanship or materials arising through normal and recommended use of the device
product_description: LUNA 3 plus is an at-home facial cleansing, and toning device for deep yet gentle facials, revealing fresh, plump, and youthful skin with every use. Gently purifying the skin with thermo-therapy, soft silicone touchpoints, and soothing T-Sonic pulsations, LUNA 3 plus melts away pore-clogging sebum and makeup residue while keeping moisture levels balanced. To treat your skin to a natural facelift, activate LUNA 3 plus’ microcurrent treatments and stimulate targeted areas for a toned younger-looking, and radiant complexion. Suitable for all skin types and ages, this rechargeable device also offers cleansing intensity, temperature, and microcurrent level customization. UNPARALLELED THERMAL CLEANSING T-Sonic pulsations and soft, silicone touchpoints enhanced by Thermo-Tech provide a deep yet gentle, heated facial cleanse at the perfect temperature for your skin. MICROCURRENT FOR A NATURAL FACELIFT Microcurrent pins deliver microcurrent directly into the skin for a deep, non-invasive age renewal, fighting signs of aging for rejuvenated, younger-looking skin. SOPHISTICATED TAILORED SKINCARE MADE SIMPLE The sophisticated fusion of multiple advanced technologies in a single device is straightforward, powerful, and easy to use, keeping moisture levels balanced while removing impurities. INSTANT APP CONNECTIVITY The device automatically connects with a smartphone to adjust the T-Sonic pulsations, heat, and microcurrent intensity to the preferred user setting. SMART SWEDISH DESIGN Ergonomical, futuristic, sleek design is 100% waterproof with no replacement brush heads needed, while a powerful battery provides up to 125 uses on a single charge.
